content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is EPAM's expectation that all EPAM employees assigned to the Topaz account are aware of the following rules that govern EPAM employee's conduct while supporting the Topaz account.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please take the necessary time to read through the below rules in detail and to complete the acknowledgment at the end of the document.  Note, this training is not all-encompassing.  All EPAM employees remain subject to EPAM's Code of Conduct and all other workplace rules and policies as well during this assignment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the event you believe there is conflict between EPAM's Code of Conduct and other workplace rules and policies, and those listed below, please speak to your EPAM Manager or EPAM People Management for clarity.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
